title: BOC Admin view batches screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN user navigated to the system admin page
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks the batches tab
custom_expected:
THEN MJC displays
AND sections can expand and collapse
AND quick jump is available and works
AND Responsiveness follows wireframe

title: Pro Player Profile headers refresh on save
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is editing a professional player profile
custom_expected: THEN the Static and secondary headers will also refresh and any changes made will display

title: Contract Loads in View on Save -Initial Creation
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is creating a contract
custom_expected: THEN all changes should be saved and contract will load in View mode

title: Contract Loads in View on Save- Preliminary
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is looking at a Preliminary Contract in edit mode
custom_expected: THEN all changes should be saved and contract will load in View mode

title: Contract Loads in View on Save- Terms Submitted
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a contract in Terms Submitted state in edit mode
custom_expected: THEN all changes should be saved and contract will load in View mode

title: Contract Loads in View on Save- Terms Confirmed
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a contract in Terms confirmed state in edit mode
custom_expected: THEN all changes should be saved and contract will load in View mode

title: Contract Loads in View on Save- Ready for Signature Terms Confirmed
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a contract that is Ready for Signature Terms Confirmed in edit mode
custom_expected: THEN all changes should be saved and contract will load in View mode

title: Contract Loads in View on Save- Ready for Signature
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a contract in Ready for Signature in edit mode
custom_expected: THEN all changes should be saved and contract will load in View mode

title: Contract Loads in View on Save- Pending Approval
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is creating a contract
custom_expected: THEN all changes should be saved and contract will load in View mode

title: Contract Loads in View on Save- Update Pending Approval
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is creating a contract
custom_expected: THEN all changes should be saved and contract will load in View mode

title: Contract Loads in View on Save- Pending Approval Terms Confirmed
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a contract  Pending Approval Terms Confirmed state in edit mode
custom_expected: THEN all changes should be saved and contract will load in View mode

title: Contract Loads in View on Save- Update Pending Approval Terms Confirmed
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a contract in Update Pending Approval Terms Confirmed state in edit mode
custom_expected: THEN all changes should be saved and contract will load in View mode

title: Contract Loads in View on Save- Approved
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing and Approved contract in edit mode
custom_expected: THEN all changes should be saved and contract will load in View mode

title: Contract Loads in View on Save- Approved for Next Year
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is creating a contract
custom_expected: THEN all changes should be saved and contract will load in View mode

title: Contract Loads in View on Save- Voided
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is viewing a Voided contract in edit mode
custom_expected: THEN all changes should be saved and contract will load in View mode

title: Contract Loads in View on Save-Expired
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is creating a contract
custom_expected: THEN all changes should be saved and contract will load in View mode

title: Contract Loads in View on Save- Terminated
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is creating a contract
custom_expected: THEN all changes should be saved and contract will load in View mode

title: Contract Loads in View on Save- Superseded
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is creating a contract
custom_expected: THEN all changes should be saved and contract will load in View mode

title: Sections Toggled to No- Expand Collapse Icon should be gray
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is creating a new Major League Contract
custom_steps: WHEN sections of the contract are toggled to NO
custom_expected: THEN the expand/collapse icon should be gray NOT blue

title: Covenant Sections Toggled to No- Expand/Collapse Icon should be gray
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is creating a new Major League Contract
custom_steps: WHEN covenant sections of the contract are toggled to NO
custom_expected: THEN the expand/collapse icon should be gray NOT blue

title: Sections Toggled to Yes- Expand/Collapse Icon should be blue
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is creating a new Major League Contract
custom_steps: WHEN sections of the contract are toggled to YES
custom_expected: THEN the expand/collapse icon should update to Blue

title: Covenant Sections Toggled to Yes- Expand/Collapse Icon should be blue
custom_preconds: GIVEN the user is creating a new Major League Contract
custom_steps: WHEN Covenant sections of the contract are toggled to YES
custom_expected: THEN the expand/collapse icon should update to Blue

title: Contract Status Header color- Preliminary
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is creating an MJ contract for a player
custom_steps: WHEN the contract is in a Preliminary Status
custom_expected: THEN Contract Status Header at the top of the page should appear in Red

title: Contract Status Header color- Approved or Higher
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is viewing a MJ contract
custom_steps: WHEN the contract is in Approved or higher status (Approved, Approved for next year, Expired, Terminated, Voided, Superseded)
custom_expected: THEN Contract Status Header at the top of the page should appear in Black

title: Contract Status Header color- Completed/Submitted
custom_preconds: GIVEN user is creating an MJ contract
custom_steps: WHEN the contract is in any status that is not Preliminary or Approved or higher (Ready for signature, Ready for signature (Terms Confirmed), Pending Approval, Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed), Update Pending Approval, Update Pending Approval (Terms Confirmed))
custom_expected: THEN Contract Status Header at the top of the page should appear in Green

title: BOC view Season Days of a contract
custom_preconds: GIVE the BOC is viewing an approved Major League Contract
custom_steps: WHEN they click the Payroll Tab
custom_expected: THEN they will view a Season Days section

title: Club views Season Days of a contract
custom_preconds: GIVE the club is viewing an approved Major League Contract
custom_steps: WHEN they click the Payroll Tab
custom_expected: THEN they will view a Season Days section
